data.name: Mud and Blood Demo
data.detailed_description: This is the demo for Mud and Blood, Steam. In this brand new version of Mud and Blood you can play up to 4 maps in campaign mode and up to 20 waves in classic mode. This version of Mud and Blood runs on it's own custom engine made from scratch to deliver raw and unfiltered unfair random brutality . The community and I (urb) worked really hard to make this new Mud and Blood the ultimate battlefield chaos simulator so jump in the fight and punch as hard as you can!!
data.about_the_game: This is the demo for Mud and Blood, Steam. In this brand new version of Mud and Blood you can play up to 4 maps in campaign mode and up to 20 waves in classic mode. This version of Mud and Blood runs on it's own custom engine made from scratch to deliver raw and unfiltered unfair random brutality . The community and I (urb) worked really hard to make this new Mud and Blood the ultimate battlefield chaos simulator so jump in the fight and punch as hard as you can!!
data.short_description: Mud and Blood, the cult classic flash strategy game is back with a vengeance and this time you are on the offensive. This is a brutal real-time strategy game set in World War 2 where you command a small squad of soldiers against impossible odds in a procedural and unforgiving battlefield.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 8
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.2+ Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p recommended, 16:9 ratio required
